${modID}:PotionID.NAME: Some Kind of Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: Exactly how depends on the potion, and you can set it up however you want.

${modID}:ElixirofRejuvenation.NAME: 返老還童的靈藥
DESCRIPTIONS: 點生命。移除你身上的所有負面效果。這瓶藥水無法在戰鬥外飲用。

${modID}:ExtremelySpicyMapoTofu.NAME: 罐裝特辣麻婆豆腐
DESCRIPTIONS: 獲得 #b80% #y寶具值 或 #b60% #y寶具威力 。
